summary: A middle-aged simple man, Egil, becomes the victim of a candid-camera in Hacke Häger's television show 'Långa näsan'. But to Häger's surprise, Egil refuses to give them his permission to ... See full summary »
cast: Knut Agnred|Kerstin Granlund|Peter Rangmar|Anders Eriksson|Per Fritzell|Jan Rippe|Lisa Alvgrim|Monica Dominique|Olof Thunberg|Claes Eriksson|Dan Ekborg|Mats Bergman|Jörgen Mörnbäck|Jan Nygren|Mona Jansson|Marie Plånborg|Olle Sarri|Petra Fock|Charles Falk|Rolf Allan Håkansson|Lars Åby Hermansen|Stefan Ljungqvist|Hans Larsson|Måns Abrahamsson|Magnus Abrahamsson|Lars 'Lim' Moberg|Margerita Islas-Siding|Ulrika Hurtig|Anna Gustafson|Maria Lundqvist|Lennart Englund|Christina Stenius|Ulf Dohlsten|Zacharias Sigfridsson|Stina Eriksson|Charlott Strandberg|Mats Wedin|Kent Fredriksson|Mi Ridell|Håkan Johannesson
title: Monopol
